price: 14.Toysa a-korosey а-sin ayróh garayyu hawwenteenimih sabbatah girá digaalá tama, nanu diggah girâ digaalál sin hawwenneh innah sin cabennok, kaadu addunyal abak sugten uma taamoomih sabbatah waarta digaalá tama keenik iyyan.
arabic: فَذُوقُواْ بِمَا نَسِيتُمۡ لِقَآءَ يَوۡمِكُمۡ هَٰذَآ إِنَّا نَسِينَٰكُمۡۖ وَذُوقُواْ عَذَابَ ٱلۡخُلۡدِ بِمَا كُنتُمۡ تَعۡمَلُونَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: fadhūqū bimā nasītum liqāa yawmikum hādhā innā nasīnākum wadhūqū ʿadhāba al-khul'di bimā kuntum taʿmalūna
